description: Similar to Uniswap, Curve Finance is an Automated Market Maker (AMM) based Decentralised Exchange (DEX). Unlike Uniswap, its main focus is only to swap between assets that are supposed to have the same value. Locked CRV tokens are used for protocol governance and also receive half of Curve's trading fees.

es.description: Similar a Uniswap, Curve Finance es un Exchange Descentralizado (DEX) basado en un Creador de Mercado Automatizado (AMM). A diferencia de Uniswap, su enfoque principal es solo intercambiar entre activos que se supone que tienen el mismo valor. Los tokens CRV bloqueados se utilizan para la gobernanza del protocolo y tambi√©n reciben la mitad de las tarifas comerciales de Curve.
